document.full_text: scuffles broke out between lawyers and security officers in a cairo court on saturday, disrupting the trial of egypt's reviled former interior minister and six other ministry officials on charges of killing protesters.
document.title: egypt court adjourns minister trial after scuffle
lines_and_colors: scuffles broke out between lawyers and security officers in a cairo court on saturday, disrupting the trial of egypt's reviled former interior minister and six other ministry officials on charges of killing protesters.
